value:
$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Seeing Dimitri and Claude enjoying
their friendly competitions brings
a smile to my face.$k$p$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|A smile, hm? That tells me volumes
about your character, Lady Altina.
You are magnanimous indeed.$k$pIt takes a kind heart to look upon
their bickering play as anything
more than petty.$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Perhaps. But they are not the only
people here who have caught my
eye, Edelgard.$k$pYou wear the air of a stern emperor,
but your tender side is not invisible
to me.$k$p$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Hm... I will choose to take that
as a compliment.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Swim22,Face|Hello, you two! We noticed you
talking about something, and we
couldn't help but be curious...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_Swim22,Face|Mind if we join you?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Swim22,Face|Have you tried the frozen treats
they have here, Edelgard? They
seem to be quite popular.$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|Not yet, but I have heard rumors...
Are they really as delicious as
people say?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_Swim22,Face|They are! You need to try one.
Follow me. I'll show you to my
favorite vendor. Come on!$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|$nMPID_双界オルティナ|This should be interesting...$k$p$Sbs150|
